job.title: Senior/Staff Mobile Engineer – React Native, React, eCommerce – Remote
job.description: Birmingham ALbrbrOur client has created a B2C application that is used in more than half of US household and utilized by the top retailers and brandsbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrulliProvide your team with the very best in leading technology liliImpact the member app team and bring a high standard of quality and performance liliProvide rich and appealing user experiences liliCollaborate with the backend to keep the user a priority liliWork together with Managers Designers and Engineers to provide highquality features liliDevelop react native modules and engineer react native solutions liliFollow datadriven approaches to conduct experiments and iterate features liliFind and fix areas that need it liliMentor other developers brliulWhat You Will Needbrulli5 years experience with crossplatform mobile app development liliStrong knowledge of unit integration e2e etc liliAble to convert designs into features liliAble to work with a QA team that validates your code liliAble to convey intricate ideas and conceptions succinctly liliGive mentorship to the other team members brliulNice to HavebrulliRedux Recoil and other React state concepts liliExperience of Accessibility best practices liliInterest in Leadership opportunities liliOpensource software and dependency management liliAdvancement of an Ecommerce application liliExperience with App distribution brliulWhy UsbrbrstronguBenefits And PerksbrustrongulliCompetitive Salary liliMedicalDentalVision lili401k matching liliUnlimited PTO brliulApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbrTagged as SeniorStaff Mobile Engineer  React Native React eCommerce  Remotebrbr
